svg.text: Automated Testing System for TTL, CMOS, and Logic ICs

g.text: Test Time: 1-10 seconds per IC (depending on complexity)
Automatic sorting and binning based on test results
Universal socket adapters allow testing of various package formats
Accuracy: >95% for common ICs, Unknown IC learning capability
Optimizes test coverage while minimizing test time
Performance: Test speed up to 1000 ICs/hour
Digital electronics labs, component identification training
Significant labor savings and quality improvements
